ai-patthana8.59:0.2_0: (This should be expanded in line with the teaching.)
ai-patthana8.59:0.3_0: should try to throw it out.
ai-patthana8.59:1.1_0: Not by listening to the teaching should be given up and rejected, not by seeing.
ai-patthana8.59:2.1_0: Nor should be given up by dispelling. It gives up the three things that should be given up by not grasping.
ai-patthana8.59:3.1_0: Not by seeing, by should be given up, not to be given up, and by dispelling. It gives up the Teaching, but it doesn’t be given up by oneself.
ai-patthana8.59:4.1_0: There are nine based on the six elements ...
